mapper.select:
select lawyer.name, lawyer.state, lawyer.gmt_create as createTime sus.account, rur.role_id as roleId, role.name as roleName from bus_lawyer lawyer left join sys_user sus on lawyer.sys_user_id = sus.id left join sys_re_user_role rur on rur.user_id = lawyer.sys_user_id left join sys_role role on role.id = rur.role_id where lawyer.is_delete = 0
and lawyer.name like #{ name }
